abstract: According to an embodiment, a computational device includes a memory and a processor. The processor receives an input of tensor data. The processor locates a first area on the tensor data. The processor maps the coordinates within the first area on the tensor data and to acquire a second area including corresponding coordinates which the coordinates within the first area on the tensor data are mapped to. The processor calculates a higher-order statistic between the first area and the second area. The processor outputs the higher-order statistic.
summary: <SOH> BRIEF DESCRIPTION OF THE DRAWINGS <EOH>FIG. 1 is a flowchart illustrating an exemplary process performed in a neural network; FIG. 2 is a schematic for explaining an example of a function f i ( ); FIG. 3 is a schematic illustrating a configuration of a computational device according to an embodiment; FIG. 4 is a flowchart illustrating an exemplary process according to the embodiment; FIG. 5 is a schematic illustrating an example of a vehicle according to an application example; FIG. 6 is a schematic illustrating an exemplary configuration of the vehicle according to the application example; FIG. 7 is a schematic illustrating an example of a configuration of a recognizing unit according to the application example in detail; FIG. 8 is a schematic illustrating an example of an input image according to the application example; and FIG. 9 is a schematic illustrating an example of an output image according to the application example. detailed-description description="Detailed Description" end="lead"?
title: COMPUTATIONAL DEVICE, COMPUTATIONAL METHOD, AND COMPUTER PROGRAM PRODUCT
